wikipedia_page.main:
Amelia Hotham (c 1776 – 1812) was a British watercolour painter.
She was the daughter of Susannah Hankey and Beaumont, 2nd Lord Hotham. She married John Woodcock in 1798. The painter George Hotham (1796–1860) was her younger cousin.Her watercolour painting Riverside landscape with a castle in the distance, dated 1793, was included in the 1905 book Women Painters of the World.
